channel.title: Through His Word
channel.itunes:subtitle: Golden Plains Baptist Church
channel.itunes:author: Pastor Rob Carlson - Golden Plains Baptist Church
channel.itunes:summary: An old fashioned, Bible believing, Bible preaching, missionary minded, fundamental, independent Baptist church, where you will hear the truth of the gospel of Jesus Christ, and be challenged to obedience to God. Join us for Sunday and Wednesday services in Portage la Prairie, Manitoba. Currently includes series in the books of Esther, 1 Corinthians, 1 Kings and James.
channel.description: An old fashioned, Bible believing, Bible preaching, missionary minded, fundamental, independent Baptist church, where you will hear the truth of the gospel of Jesus Christ, and be challenged to obedience to God. Join us for Sunday and Wednesday services in Portage la Prairie, Manitoba. Currently includes series in the books of Esther, 1 Corinthians and 2 Samuel.
